priority_searches.name: San Francisco / Bay Area Punk
priority_searches.query: ("San Francisco" OR "Bay Area" OR Gilman OR Berkeley OR "East Bay") AND (punk OR hardcore) AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Washington DC Hardcore
priority_searches.query: ("Washington DC" OR "DC hardcore" OR Dischord OR "Positive Force") AND (punk OR hardcore) AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: New York City Punk
priority_searches.query: ("New York" OR NYC OR CBGB OR "Lower East Side" OR "East Village") AND punk AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Los Angeles Punk
priority_searches.query: ("Los Angeles" OR "LA punk" OR Hollywood OR "Orange County" OR SST OR Dangerhouse) AND punk AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Boston Hardcore
priority_searches.query: (Boston OR "Boston hardcore" OR "This Is Boston Not LA") AND (punk OR hardcore) AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Minneapolis Punk
priority_searches.query: (Minneapolis OR "Twin Cities" OR Minnesota) AND punk AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Chicago Punk
priority_searches.query: (Chicago OR "Wax Trax" OR "Touch and Go") AND punk AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Seattle Punk
priority_searches.query: (Seattle OR "Pacific Northwest" OR "Sub Pop") AND punk AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Detroit Punk
priority_searches.query: (Detroit OR Michigan) AND punk AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Philadelphia Hardcore
priority_searches.query: (Philadelphia OR Philly OR "Philadelphia hardcore") AND punk AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: London Punk Scene
priority_searches.query: (London OR "UK punk" OR "British punk") AND (punk OR "77") AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Manchester / Northern UK
priority_searches.query: (Manchester OR Buzzcocks OR Factory OR "Northern England") AND punk AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Berlin Punk
priority_searches.query: (Berlin OR "German punk") AND punk AND (fanzine OR zine)

priority_searches.name: Tokyo / Japanese Punk
priority_searches.query: (Tokyo OR Japan OR Japanese) AND punk AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Maximum Rocknroll Collection
priority_searches.query: Maximum Rocknroll

priority_searches.name: Punk Planet Archive
priority_searches.query: punk planet

priority_searches.name: Riot Grrrl Zines
priority_searches.query: riot grrrl OR bikini kill OR kathleen hanna

priority_searches.name: UK First Wave Punk
priority_searches.query: (sniffin glue OR ripped torn OR jamming OR chainsaw) AND (1976 OR 1977 OR 1978)

priority_searches.name: US Hardcore Zines
priority_searches.query: (flipside OR touch and go OR forced exposure OR suburban voice) AND hardcore

priority_searches.name: Anarcho Punk
priority_searches.query: anarcho punk OR crass OR profane existence

priority_searches.name: Queercore/Homocore
priority_searches.query: homocore OR queercore OR J.D.s OR outpunk

priority_searches.name: International Punk Zines
priority_searches.query: (punk fanzine OR punk zine) AND (japan OR germany OR brazil OR australia OR france)

priority_searches.name: Regional US Scenes
priority_searches.query: (boston OR minneapolis OR detroit OR chicago OR washington dc) AND (punk zine OR hardcore fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Cometbus & Personal Zines
priority_searches.query: cometbus OR slug lettuce OR your flesh OR motorbooty

priority_searches.name: Cometbus (targeted)
priority_searches.query: title:Cometbus OR subject:Cometbus

priority_searches.name: Your Flesh (targeted)
priority_searches.query: ("Your Flesh") AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Slug & Lettuce
priority_searches.query: ("Slug & Lettuce" OR "Slug and Lettuce") AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Ben Is Dead
priority_searches.query: "Ben is Dead" AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Forced Exposure
priority_searches.query: "Forced Exposure" AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Touch and Go
priority_searches.query: "Touch and Go" AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: No Mag (LA)
priority_searches.query: "No Mag" AND (punk OR zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Damage (LA)
priority_searches.query: title:Damage AND (punk OR "LA punk")

priority_searches.name: Chainsaw (UK)
priority_searches.query: Chainsaw AND (zine OR fanzine) AND (punk)

priority_searches.name: Kill Your Pet Puppy (UK)
priority_searches.query: "Kill Your Pet Puppy" OR KYPP

priority_searches.name: Ripped & Torn (UK)
priority_searches.query: "Ripped & Torn" AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: Jamming (UK)
priority_searches.query: title:Jamming AND (zine OR fanzine) AND (punk)

priority_searches.name: Homocore / Queercore (targeted)
priority_searches.query: (Homocore OR "J.D.s" OR Outpunk) AND (zine OR fanzine)

priority_searches.name: International (Spanish/Portuguese)
priority_searches.query: ((fanzine OR fanzin OR zine) AND punk) AND (es OR español OR spain OR mexico OR chile OR argentina OR brasil OR brasileiro)

priority_searches.name: International (German/French/Italian)
priority_searches.query: (fanzine AND punk) AND (deutsch OR germany OR france OR français OR italiana OR italia)

priority_searches.name: International (Japan)
priority_searches.query: (punk AND zine) OR (El Zine)

priority_searches.name: Burn Collector (targeted)
priority_searches.query: ("Burn Collector" AND (zine OR fanzine)) OR ("Al Burian" AND (zine OR fanzine))
